tech_news.title: Lego’s Smart Play Bricks Sound Awful - Gizmodo
tech_news.description: Lego's controversial wave of tech-enhanced 'Star Wars' sets are getting into people's hands, and showing the premium being paid isn't quite worth it.

tech_news.title: Ex-Apple team launches Acme Weather, a new take on weather forecasting - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: The team that sold their last app Dark Sky to Apple are back with Acme Weather, which offers alternative forecasts, rainbow and sunset alerts, and more.

tech_news.title: Amazon shutting down another online-only game and refunding Xbox players - TrueAchievements
tech_news.description: Amazon Games and Glowmade are shutting down the King of Meat servers soon, which will discontinue all Xbox achievements in the dungeon crawler.

tech_news.title: Meta AI alignment director shares her OpenClaw email-deletion nightmare: 'I had to RUN to my Mac mini' - Business Insider
tech_news.description: Meta alignment director Summer Yue hooked OpenClaw up to her inbox. Then, the bot tried to delete her emails. Yue chalked it up to a "rookie mistake."
